data.title: Vue Dev Tools - Vuex not clickable
data.meta_description: Something that has started occurring recently - the Vuex icon within Vue Dev Tools in Chrome has become unresponsive. I am using the following Vue versions within a webpack build along with Vue Dev...
data.text:
Something that has started occurring recently - the Vuex icon within Vue Dev Tools in Chrome has become unresponsive. I am using the following Vue versions within a webpack build along with Vue Dev Tools 3.1.6.

"vue": "^2.1.0", "vue-router": "^2.7.0", "vuex": "^2.3.1"

The Vuex icon is totally unresponsive (ie you can't click on it) although Vuex is working fine within the context of the application. The component icon within Vue Dev Tools works fine. I should note that occasionally Vuex (the Vuex icon is clickable) will work within Dev Tools (about 10% of the time).

I've tried reinstalling Vue dev tools but no change noticed.

Very frustrating so any help appreciated!
